Name: Sounds of Music
About the game: Sounds of Music is a short and minimal puzzle game that harmonizes the sounds of music. Overview Move and mix colors to make music come to life Over 50 puzzling levels to solve 6 different relaxing background music Turn up the volume and listen to the sounds of music
